EmailTemplate.name: Interest in PhD by publication degree
EmailTemplate.subject: Interest in PhD by publication degree
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your email and interest in our PhD degree.
All doctoral and research master’s students are permitted to submit a thesis including published works. The thesis including published works is not a different degree; rather, it is a thesis format that includes papers that have been prepared, or accepted, for publication. Papers must have been researched and written during the course of enrolment.
More information on thesis including published works is available here.
If you have any questions regarding your PhD application, please contact Admissions at mge-apply@monash.edu.
Best regards _______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
